alert.note: Alert for Gray (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Warning issued April 22 at 9:27PM CDT until April 22 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A TORNADO WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 945 PM CDT FOR GRAY COUNTY... At 926 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm capable of producing a tornado was located 10 miles northeast of Groom, or 15 miles south of Pampa, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Tornado and golf ball size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated rotation. IMPACT...Flying debris will be dangerous to those caught without shelter. Mobile homes will be damaged or destroyed. Damage to roofs, windows, and vehicles will occur. Tree damage is likely. Locations impacted include... Pampa, Lefors and Kingsmill. TORNADO...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75IN
info.instruction: TAKE COVER NOW! Move to a basement or an interior room on the lowest floor of a sturdy building. Avoid windows. If you are outdoors, in a mobile home, or in a vehicle, move to the closest substantial shelter and protect yourself from flying debris.
